html: xCapo 3 --- [Intro:] Am C Dm C Em7 Verse 1, 4: Am C Dm C Em7 Verse 2, 3: Am C Dm C [Bridge: ] E F C (x2) F G (x2) --- [Chorus] Am I'll go, I'll go, I'll go, I'll go for you C I'll fight, I'll fight, I'll fight, I'll fight for you Dm I'll kill, I'll kill, I'll kill, I'll kill for you C Em7 I will, I will, I will Am I'll go,I'll go, I'll go, I'll go for you C I'll fight, I'll fight, I'll fight, I'll fight for you Dm I'll die, I'll die, I'll die, I'll die for you C Em7 I will, I will, I will [Verse] E And if I die I'll die, I'll die alone on some F C Old private hill F C Abandoned by the mill F All my blood will G Spring and spill F I'll crash the air G and be still [Verse] Am You'll wait With the star from a dream C And know that I am gone Dm You'll feel it in your heart C But not for very long Am You'll rise each day as planned C Your will is your command Dm And stand each Sunday C Em7 A hymnal steady in your hand E You'll sing to yourself F The rising-falling melody C That you could never read F C Without the choirs' lead F G Still alone, and lost in deep F G And your soul will not be free [Chorus] Am I will go , I will go, I will go And in wars waters C I will wade Dm And I will know If I remorse or regret C The fairness of our trade Am For you to live I took your place A deal was made C And I was paid Dm And the goldness I was told Was a place C Where my body could be laid E And we will steal your life And I own F In better homes surrounded C By your peers F C Without suffering or fear F G Grandchildren far and near F G And none will shed a tear F G For the love no longer here [Chorus] Am I'll go, I'll go, I'll go, I'll go for you C I will Dm I'll fight, I'll fight,I'll fight, I'll fight for you C Em7 I will, I will, I will Am I'll kill, I'll kill, I'll kill, I'll kill for you C I will Dm I'll die, I'll die, I'll die, I'll die for you C Em7 I will, I will, I will [Outro] E And if I die I'll die F I'll die alone like Jesus C On a cross F C My faith cannot by tossed F G And my life will not be lost F G If my love comes across
